PROFILES.TITLE: Full Stack Developer | IA Developer
TEXT_LIST: Hello, I'm Marcos Bazán, a passionate Full Stack developer with experience in AI and a focus on software engineering. I love creating innovative and efficient solutions that enhance user experience.
My goal is to continue learning and growing in the field of technology, contributing to projects that make a difference.
I am available to collaborate on exciting projects!

EXTRAS.TITLE: Extras

INTERESTS.TITLE: Interests
INTERESTS.TEXT: I enjoy learning new technologies and experimenting with personal projects.

HOBBIES.TITLE: Hobbies
HOBBIES.TEXT: Gym training, Cycling, Traveling, and audiovisual editing with Photoshop/Premiere Pro.

RECOGNITIONS.TITLE: Recognitions
RECOGNITIONS.TEXT: Recognized during my internship for my ability to learn quickly and my willingness to take on new challenges.

CERTIFICATES_LIST: Application development with NodeJs and Express – Openwebinars
